title: The figures shown are based upon one (1) fixture being the minimum required for the number of persons indicated or part thereof
clause_text: The figures shown are based upon one (1) fixture being the minimum required for the number of persons indicated or part thereof. Building categories not included in the tables shall be considered separately by the Authority. Drinking fountains shall not be installed in the toilets.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The figures shown are based upon one (1) fixture being the minimum required for the number of persons indicated or part thereof.
